ingredients: 1 (2 pound) Sutton & Dodge™ boneless beef chuck roast
3/4 cup Archer Farms™ roasted poblano pepper cooking sauce
instructions: Place beef in a 3 to 4 -quart slow cooker.
Cover and cook on low setting 8 to 10 hours.
Remove beef from cooker; place in large bowl.
Shred beef, removing fat, using 2 forks.
Stir cooking sauce and juices from slow cooker into shredded beef.
To serve, place 1/4 cup meat mixture in center of tortilla.
Place toppings on beef, if desired.
title: Shredded Beef Tacos

normalized_ingredients.Isw54oS1o: Sutton & Dodge™ boneless beef chuck roast
normalized_ingredients.IUSqjdue1: Archer Farms™ roasted poblano pepper cooking sauce

steps: Place beef in a 3 to 4 -quart slow cooker. Sprinkle with taco seasoning.
Cover and cook on low setting 8 to 10 hours.
Remove beef from cooker; place in large bowl. Shred beef, removing fat, using 2 forks. Stir cooking sauce and juices from slow cooker into shredded beef.
To serve, place 1/4 cup meat mixture in center of tortilla. Place toppings on beef, if desired.
